thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Kelly

author: Kelly
title: Kelly
text:
Great experience except for one uncertainty- when confirming my purchase I only got a blank screen no confirmation. I did not want to refresh the page to submit again as I did not want to be charged again.. I did check my email however to see the confirmation but would have been nice to see the purchase go through the site to the end instead of using email to confirm.
Overall though i have been very happy with the product and its durability:) will order again!
